p:
Pupae are produced by nulliparous ( A
n ) and parous ( A
p ) adult females at rates ρ
n and ρ
p , respectively. Losses from the pupal stage are due to pupae emerging as nulliparous adults ( A
n ), at rate β/2, to density-dependent mortality, with coefficient δ and mortality μ
P . Losses from the nulliparous adult stage are due to first larviposition at rate ρ
n and mortality ( μ
A ), assumed equal for both nulliparous and parous females.
